sentences.sContent: George W. Bush—soon, like so many American workers, to have lots of time on his hands—may soon be shopping a memoir, and for good reason.
sentences.sContent_eng: George W. Bush—soon, like so many American workers, to have lots of time on his hands—may soon be shopping a memoir, and for good reason.
sentences.sCn: 布什不久就会像许多美国工人那样拥有相当多的闲暇时光，他可能会用一个极好的理由购买一本实录。

synos.tran: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录

trans.tranOther: a short piece of writing about a person or place that you knew well, or an event that you experienced
